agents.name: Requirements Analyst
agents.description: Analyzes project requirements, creates implementation plans, and manages project scope

agents.name: Architect
agents.description: Designs system architecture, creates technical specifications, and makes high-level design decisions

agents.name: Implementer
agents.description: Implements features based on architectural specifications, writes production-quality code

agents.name: Tester
agents.description: Designs and implements comprehensive test suites, validates functionality and quality

agents.name: Documenter
agents.description: Creates and maintains comprehensive project documentation, user guides, and API references
